ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 240
ygData.msgSnippet: Evil eye are a blast, just make sure you have whirl and colour flux up (colour shift if you ve got it).  Mes pet, as someone else stated, quicken pet, make
ygData.messageBody:
Evil eye are a blast, just make sure you have whirl and colour flux up
(colour shift if you've got it). Mes pet, as someone else stated, quicken
pet, make sure to have endure magic resist up as well as all other buffs.
Start off with Tashani, then immediately DD and run into range, Colour
Flux, (Colour Shirt,) WTYH, DD, repeat until dead. They die fast. I did
one or two at 23, but it wasn't an easy battle by any means. I'd image
they are pretty easy at 24 with the new spells.
